dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Aha! Art thou my partner in duel?!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Good morrow! Hmhm, another bright day indeed. Let's see, mayhaps I shall go on a merry stroll?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Hm... Midday certainly brings out the crowd. Aha! See yonder! A brawl, perhaps?!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Hast thou supped yet? I have found thee a nice restaurant nearabouts! Their dinner menu features a rather delicious soufflé. Wilt thou accompany me?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: I mustn't dally! The city abounds with conflict, and many seek those that would take up arms in their place!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Strolling through the streets and taking mine own mind off things is an important part of my profession!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: To throw down my gauntlet is a dignified and honorable declaration of mine intent to duel! 'Tis an indispensable part of a duel's etiquette.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Prithee, I cannot help but be perplexed… Wherefore do those struck by my gauntlet turn red with fury?
What causeth them to fume, I wonder…? Perhaps their hearts are simply not fit for an honorable duel.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
The station of a Director is no different from that of mine associates! In truth, I do not call them my subordinates, even.
I have but a meager merit in experience, no more. Besides, perchance we may have a newcomer who surpasses my skill in combat!

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: (Hums)

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Aha! To be recognized is to be bestowed with honor! I thank thee!

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Aha, a dueling request!

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Perchance a narrow alleyway shall be to my benefit...

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: 'Tis ill-advised to speak to me whilst I fight a duel.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Allez!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Dost thou surrender?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Tsk...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: 'Twas a duel most amusing!

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Aah... 'Twas... a shameful display...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Poetry in motion!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Ahh, this was... I beg forgiveness.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: A fervorous duel! You lot were no slouches, yet... Hm, I eagerly await your next challenge.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Wonderful! You were surpassed by my skill, though only by a little.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Ugh... How disgraceful...!
